column4: I installed gnome-shell from the app store, and restarted selecting gnome from the gear menu. Gnome 3.2 does not appear to be properly installed. How do I fix it?
Gnome 3.2 is installed by default on 11.10, what version of Ubuntu are you on?
What do you mean, Gnome3.2 doesn't appear to be installed? Are you seeing breakage somehow?
